item.title: Viewpoint: Referring to factors such as oil, gold, global currency market cap, the future price of Ethereum could reach $706,000
item.description: On July 30th, a research report from ethdigitaloil.com indicates that when taking into account factors such as oil, gold, and the global currency market capitalization, etc., the market capitalization of ETH may reach $85 trillion, and the expected future price of a single ETH is projected to reach $706,000.Before this news, Bitmine, an ETH reserve-listed company, officially announced on Platform X that they have invited multiple research institutions to assess the "reset value" of Ethereum (Wall Street valuation), with an estimated value of $60,000.

item.title: Former Bankless team member shaaa will serve as the Listing Team Lead at Coinbase
item.description: On July 30th, the former member of the Bankless team, shaaa (@shaaa256), announced that he had joined Coinbase's listings team as the leader.

item.title: Several KOLs have revealed that the team member of Kaito, Wen Yue, is suspected of receiving a bribe. Wen Yue has denied the accusation, stating that all payments were made directly to Kaito.
item.description: July 30th. Recently, several KOLs, like CryptoBrave (@cryptobraveHQ), have claimed that Kaito's Business Manager WenYue is suspected of taking bribes.Among them, CryptoBrave said that WenYue imposed an excessive listing fee on certain projects, overcharging approximately $200,000 in suspected bribes in the name of an overall fee package to ensure the project's priority listing on Kaito. The crypto influencer @SEFATUBA3 stated, "WenYue demands a $30,000 bridge toll, which can be paid through white list allocation or tokens."In response to the above accusations, WenYue (@0xWenMoon) said, "I have never accepted any bribes. Any payment exceeding $150,000 was for additional professional analysis services (such as the Kaito Pro platform) or to accelerate the listing schedule (for example, if the project team needed to quickly climb the rankings to align with a specific event). All payments are made directly to Kaito and not to me or any other individual."

item.title: Strategy overall holding cost average is $73,277, with an unrealized profit of $28.18 billion.
item.description: On July 30th, according to the data from LookOnChain, after today's accumulation announcement, Strategy currently holds a combined total of 628,791 bitcoins. The average holding price is $73,277, and the unrealized profit amounts to $28.18 billion.

item.title: Statistic: BlackRock's ETF invested over $1.2 billion last week to purchase ETH, four times the amount purchased for Bitcoin
item.description: On July 30th. According to Arkham Data, last week, BlackRock's Spot ETF allocated more than $1.2 billion to purchase ETH. During the same period, it only bought $267 million worth of Bitcoin.

item.title: AI startup Anthropic is planning to raise $3-5 billion at a $170 billion valuation, with Iconiq Capital leading the round
item.description: On July 30th, as per the report from CNBC, the artificial intelligence startup Anthropic is engaged in negotiations with investors to raise between $3 billion and $5 billion in a financing round that is being led by Iconiq Capital. The company is valued at $170 billion. As a competitor of OpenAI, Anthropic's valuation has witnessed rapid growth in the past few months.In March of this year, the company raised $3.5 billion in a financing round that was led by Lightspeed Venture Partners. At that time, the valuation of the company was $61.5 billion. Despite Anthropic's CEO, Dario Amodei, previously warning about the national security risks associated with accepting investment from Middle Eastern sovereign wealth funds, leaked memos suggest that he is now rethinking the acceptance of Middle Eastern funds.

item.title: Basechain AI Token BNKR Market Cap Surpasses $60 Million, 24-hour Growth Rate Reaches 16.84%
item.description: On July 30th, based on the data from GMGN, the market capitalization of the Base Chain AI Token BNKR has exceeded 60 million US dollars. It currently stands at 60.78 million US dollars, with a 24-hour growth rate of 16.84%.Previously, Coinbase will add support for BankrCoin (BNKR) on the Base Network. If liquidity conditions are met, trading will commence on July 30, 2025, at 9:00 AM Pacific Time or later.

item.title: Gate 24-hour Fund Flow Surpasses $100 Million, Ranking Second Globally
item.description: On July 30th, according to DefiLlama data, Gate witnessed a 24-hour net inflow of more than $1.0567 billion. In the past seven days, it had a net inflow of more than $748.4 million and ranked second globally in both aspects.

item.title: Upbit Trading Volume Continues to Shrink: XRP, OMNI, and Ethereum in Top Three
item.description: On July 30th, based on CoinGecko data, within the past 24 hours, the trading volume on Upbit reached $26.65 billion. The XRP/KRW trading pair took the lead with a 12.09% share. OMNI and Ethereum followed in second and third place respectively.

item.title: Ethereum 10th Anniversary Torch NFT Holder Addresses Exceed 145,000
item.description: On July 30th, based on on-chain information, the address of the Ethereum Tenth Anniversary Torch Commemorative NFT holder has exceeded 145,000. The minting will come to an end at 24:00 on July 31st (UTC+8).BlockBeats previously reported that Ethereum launched "The Torch" NFT to pay tribute to those who have shaped its development and values in the first decade of Ethereum and will assist in building Ethereum's future. During the 10 days leading up to Ethereum's tenth anniversary, this The Torch NFT will symbolically be passed between wallets. On July 30th, The Torch NFT will be burned to commemorate the founding of Ethereum's tenth anniversary. On that day, everyone will be able to mint a commemorative NFT.
